select * from ( select pd.*, d.name region_name, p.name points_name, pt.id type_id, pt.name type_name, c.name channel_name, c.gps_x, c.gps_y, t.org_code, t.name org_name from data_check_points_device pd left join data_check_points p on p.id = pd.points_id left join data_check_points_type pt on pt.id = p.type_id left join data_device_channel c on c.id = pd.channel_id left join data_device_tree t on t.id = c.org_code left join sys_dept d on d.id = pd.region_code ) t

select p.name point_name, p.id point_id, pt.id point_type_id, pt.name point_type_name, p.region_name, p.region_code from data_check_points_device pd left join data_check_points p on p.id = pd.points_id left join data_check_points_type pt on pt.id = p.type_id

select pd.channel_id, dc.name channel_name, p.name point_name from data_check_points_device pd left join data_check_points p on p.id = pd.points_id left join data_device_channel dc on dc.id = pd.channel_id where pd.channel_id = #{channelId}
